steps.displayName: Write DataFrame to a Kinesis Stream
steps.description: This step will write a DataFrame to a Kinesis Stream

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to post to the Kinesis stream

params.name: region
params.description: The region of the Kinesis stream

params.name: streamName
params.description: The name of the Kinesis stream

params.name: partitionKey
params.description: The key to use when partitioning the message

params.name: separator
params.description: The separator character to use when combining the column data

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The optional API key to use for the Kinesis stream

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The optional API secret to use for the Kinesis stream

steps.displayName: Write DataFrame to a Kinesis Stream Using Global Credentials

params.name: region
params.description: The region of the Kinesis stream

params.name: streamName
params.description: The name of the Kinesis stream

params.name: partitionKey
params.description: The key to use when partitioning the message

params.name: separator
params.description: The separator character to use when combining the column data

steps.description: This step will read a DataFrame from the given S3 path

params.description: The S3 path to load data

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The optional API key to use for S3 access

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The optional API secret to use for S3 access

params.name: options
params.description: The optional DataFrame Options

steps.description: This step will write a DataFrame in a given format to S3

params.name: secretAccessKey

params.description: The optional DataFrame Options
